are you a member of the vbox group?
you also need to add the following line in /etc/fstab.. none /proc/bus/usb usbfs devgid=125,devmode=664 0 0

then in a terminal type ... grep vboxusers /etc/group to get the righ devgid number to put in that line in fstab
